english.segment1: sick inside oh so sick. restore this heart of mine. suffer, don't let go. she's gone don't let go
english.segment2: trials and tribulations. meditation suplication. the desires of our hearts. for every memory every breath. for every moment and every thought. shall be cherished in our hearts for eternity. but first and foremost. we must seek GOD the most high
english.segment3: suffer, don't let go. she's gone don't let go. if foundations are destroyed. where shall the righteous be
english.segment4: righteousness in you. GOD, GOD, GOD. so far , don't let go
